attributes.action: Minimum wages should be all the same,including the 16/17/18 years old
attributes.additional_details: I consider as a 16 years old personal that all the minimum wages should be equal.Why?Because a 16 years old has to do the same work as an overaged person,a 16 years old person had to pay the same rent as an adult,a 16 years old has to pay the same expenses as an adult(travelling,food,etc).l have to pay rent all by myself,and being 16 is hard because l have to study and to work in the same time,while an adult has maybe just to work.Having less minimum wage does not mean l need less money
attributes.background: They should raise the minimum wages for people that are under 18.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/618790
